msbt.message: So, like, hear me out. I found a recipe for a Bunny Day crown, and I am totes going to share it with you. That way, when we wear our crowns, we can be Bunny Day royalty together! Only, just so we're clear, I get to be the Bunny Day Queen. Cool? Good. Here's your copy, .
Just think, there must be all sorts of other recipes hidden all over the island I guess that means it's time to start searching this island from top to bottom! Ugh, a queen's work is never done!
Wait up! , your pockets are super full!If you want this royally fab recipe, you're going to have to lighten your load and come get it from me later.

I'm SO happy I could totes hug a a super-bouncy yellow bunny! Want to know why?Because this got her mitts on a Bunny Day bag recipe!Of course, I'm totally going to share it with you, , because that's how I roll. See, I made you your own copy, .
But we're not stopping here. No no no! We're just getting this Bunny Day business started! We are going to gather every single egg we can find and we are going to craft up some cuteness!

Hold up. You're slowing my roll here. I mean, there's no way this recipe is going to fit in your pockets. Just talk to me after your pockets aren't, like, about to explode. I'll keep your recipe safe, no worries.
I have an AMAZING opportunity for you, and it's all thanks to my lot of .I'm trying to up my charity game, and since you're always so sweet to me, I'd like to give you 5 of them!
I def have a natural talent for finding eggs, tee-hee. Try to keep up if you can, !
GASP! I can't give you my super- generous gift if your pockets are full, silly.Once you've freed up some space, mosey on back, and I'll shower my generosity on you!
